definition: three-stroke form of Kangxi radical 94 犬[quan3]
phonetic component in certain characters with sound huò, such as 護, 獲, 穫 and 擭
to learn of sth/to find out/to get news
variant of 收穫|收获[shou1 huo4]
to track down and seize (a criminal suspect, contraband etc)
to uncover (a criminal plot)/to break open and capture
to learn of (an event)/to hear about (sth)

sentences.english: Won the "Sama educate award" in the area of garments industry.
sentences.chinese: 獲紡織服裝領域“桑麻教育獎”。

sentences.english: If the results are not for the current year, please indicate that the year of the entry.
sentences.chinese: 如非本年度所考獲之成績，請註明應考年份。

sentences.english: Meg graduated from Taiwan's Ming-Chuan College with a BA degree in Tourism Management.

sentences.english: Chinese man gets death penalty for murdering 13.

sentences.english: The company boasts a lot of awards it received at international fairs.

sentences.english: This film won Golden Bear at the 57th Berlin International Film Festival in 2007.
sentences.chinese: 本片獲第57屆柏林電影節最佳影片金熊獎。

sentences.english: Because of his writings, professor Yang Qi has won national and ministerial awards several times.
sentences.chinese: 楊起教授著作多次獲國家級與部級獎勵。

sentences.english: Yu Kongjian received a doctor degree in Design from Harvard University, the USin 1995.
sentences.chinese: 1995年在美國哈佛大學獲設計學博士學位。

sentences.english: Donation of HK$100 or above is tax-deductible.

The first round of invitations is expected to occur in January 2013.

definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to implement/to carry out/to execute/to run
unit (of measure)/unit (group of people as a whole)/work unit (place of employment, esp. in the PRC prior to economic reform)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
back of neck/item/thing/term (in a mathematical formula)/sum (of money)/classifier for principles, items, clauses, tasks, research projects etc
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
plan/project/program/to plan/to map out/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]
